pr_title: Setting the Healthy/Unhealhy Context for Temp Profile Dimensions RCAs

timeline.message: Setting the Healthy/Unhealhy Context for Temperature Profile Dimensions RCAs

timeline.bodyText: we should use snake case for static variables
timeline.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: Ideally we should remove this argument in constructor and fix the value to 5 seconds in base class. Joydeep wanted us to refactor this long time ago
timeline.author: rguo-aws

replies.bodyText: I can see that this the evaluationInterval of the AggregateMetric is 1s. I dont know if there is any reason for that. If not, we should remove it altogether from here and fix its value to constant 5 seconds.
replies.author: aditjind

replies.bodyText: let's create a separate issue to keep track of that.
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.message: Moving the Static Variables to Camel Case

timeline.bodyText: Thank You for making this change.
timeline.author: khushbr

timeline.bodyText: nit: Consider moving this to line 79 and add the context information as well.
timeline.author: khushbr
